channel.title: CVE Feed for Heimavista -- Rpage
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Heimavista -- Rpage

item.title: CVE-2024-2412|2024-08-01T19:11:53.516Z -- heimavista -- rpage
item.description: The disabling function of the user registration page for Heimavista Rpage and Epage is not properly implemented, allowing remote attackers to complete user registration on sites where user registration is supposed to be disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-2412|2024-03-13T02:54:05.069Z -- heimavista -- rpage
item.description: The disabling function of the user registration page for Heimavista Rpage and Epage is not properly implemented, allowing remote attackers to complete user registration on sites where user registration is supposed to be disabled.
